decks.notes: The deck focuses on using aggressive creatures like Emperor of Bones and Overlord of the Balemurk to apply pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push. It also utilizes flicker effects like Ephemerate and Flickerwisp to make use of powerful enter-the-battlefield abilities of creatures like Solitude and Recruiter of the Guard. The deck aims to control the board and out-value the opponent by making efficient trades and generating card advantage, ultimately overwhelming the opponent with a combination of aggression and disruption.

The deck revolves around utilizing the synergy between Basking Broodscale and Glaring Fleshraker to generate a powerful combo that overwhelms the opponent. By combining these creatures with support cards like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble, the deck aims to control the board and set up for a devastating finish with Emrakul, the Promised End. The inclusion of Urza's Saga provides additional versatility and consistency, while cards like Ancient Stirrings and Writhing Chrysalis help to find key pieces of the combo.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt your opponent's game plan while quickly developing your own board presence. By utilizing a combination of disruptive creatures like Flickerwisp and Solitude, along with powerful spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push, you can control the pace of the game and limit your opponent's options. Additionally, cards like Ephemerate and Relic of Progenitus allow you to generate value and disrupt graveyard strategies. Overall, this deck aims to pressure your opponent while disrupting their game plan to secure a victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing Song of Creation to draw as many cards as possible and generate mana with Mox Opal and Mox Amber. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Mishra's Bauble provide additional card advantage and graveyard recursion. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps dig for combo pieces while Malevolent Rumble and Lava Dart provide removal and damage. The deck aims to set up a powerful combo turn to overwhelm the opponent with a burst of spells and card advantage, while utilizing various lands and artifacts to support the strategy.

This deck focuses on utilizing a multicolor aggressive strategy, utilizing powerful creatures like Scion of Draco and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury to quickly overwhelm opponents. With a mix of burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Tribal Flames, along with counterspells like Stubborn Denial, the deck aims to control the board and deal damage efficiently. Leyline Binding and Leyline of the Guildpact provide additional support to the strategy, while Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Territorial Kavu offer early game aggression. The deck aims to apply constant pressure and finish off opponents before they can stabilize.

This deck focuses on aggressive creature plays along with burn spells to control the board and deal direct damage to the opponent. It also utilizes Thoughtseize for disruption and Arena of Glory for additional creature buffs. The synergy between cards like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Goblin Bombardment allows for rapid damage output. The inclusion of Sephiroth, Fabled SOLDIER adds versatility and power to the deck. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Voice of Victory provide additional support and finishers in the late game. Overall, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly and efficiently.

This deck aims to control the opponent's draws and resources through a combination of cards like Lantern of Insight, Codex Shredder, and Ensnaring Bridge. It also disrupts the opponent's strategy with cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, while locking them out of certain plays with Blood Moon and Pithing Needle. The deck also has a tutor package with Profane Tutor to find key pieces like The Meathook Massacre or The Underworld Cookbook. It can close out games with molten Collapse or The Mycosynth Gardens.

The key concept of this deck is to utilize a combination of powerful spells and abilities to control the game without relying on traditional land cards. By leveraging cards like Thundertrap Trainer, Goblin Charbelcher, and Lotus Bloom, the player can disrupt their opponent's strategy while setting up their own win condition. With a focus on counterspells, card draw, and recursion, this deck aims to outmaneuver and outlast the opponent, ultimately securing victory through strategic play and resource management.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and burn spells. Cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls provide early aggression, while cards like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment help to push through damage and control the board. Additionally, Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury provide powerful finishers. The deck aims to apply pressure from the beginning of the game and keep the opponent on the back foot, leading to a swift victory.

The deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo using cards like Basking Broodscale and Blade of the Bloodchief to create a lethal damage output. It also includes support cards like Ancient Stirrings and Kozilek's Command to search for key pieces and control the board. Eldrazi Temple and Urza's Saga provide mana ramp and extra value from tokens, while cards like Glaring Fleshraker and Walking Ballista offer additional threats. Overall, the deck aims to quickly build up a dominant board presence and overwhelm the opponent with its combo potential.

The main focus of the deck is to disrupt the opponent's hand with cards like Inquisition of Kozilek and Thoughtseize, while also using powerful removal spells like Fatal Push and Kozilek's Command. It aims to apply early pressure with efficient creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Nethergoyf, while maintaining card advantage through Mishra's Bauble and drawing cards off of Emperor of Bones. The deck also has a disruptive aspect with Graveyard Trespasser and Nihil Spellbomb, as well as a mana denial plan with Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth and targeted land destruction with Ifnir Deadlands.
